ROS EEL Example

This is an example of using EEL with ROS. The following components are available:

  • ROS Subscribers
  • ROS Publishers
  • ROS Params
  • Tabs
  • Hover Description

ROS Subscribers

/eel_subtest/bool

<div
  class="subscribe"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="std_msgs.msg.Bool"
>
  <input type="text" ext=".data" readonly />
</div>

/eel_subtest/int32

<div
  class="subscribe"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="std_msgs.msg.Int32"
>
  <input type="text" ext=".data" readonly />
</div>

/eel_subtest/int64

<div
  class="subscribe"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="std_msgs.msg.Int64"
>
  <input type="text" ext=".data" readonly />
</div>

/eel_subtest/float32

<div
  class="subscribe"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="std_msgs.msg.Float32"
>
  <input type="text" ext=".data" readonly />
</div>

/eel_subtest/float64

<div
  class="subscribe"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="std_msgs.msg.Float64"
>
  <input type="text" ext=".data" readonly />
</div>

/eel_subtest/string

<div
  class="subscribe"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="std_msgs.msg.String"
>
  <input type="text" ext=".data" readonly />
</div>

/eel_subtest/transform

<div class="subscribe" name="{{name}}" m-type="geometry_msgs.msg.Transform">
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".translation.x"/>
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".translation.y" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".translation.z" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".rotation.x" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".rotation.y" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".rotation.z" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".rotation.w" />
</div>

/eel_subtest/pose

<div
  class="subscribe"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="geometry_msgs.msg.Pose"
>
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".position.x"/>
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".position.y" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".position.z" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".orientation.x" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".orientation.y" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".orientation.z" />
  <input readonly type="text" ext=".orientation.w" />
</div>

/eel_subtest/image

<div
  class="subscribe"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="sensor_msgs.msg.Image"
>
  <img ext=".data" src="" width="640" height="480" />
</div>

ROS Publishers

/eel_pubtest/bool

<div
  class="publish"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="std_msgs.msg.Bool"
>
  <input type="checkbox" ext=".data" value={{value}} style="display: none"/>
  <button class="btn">
    {{label}}
  </button>
</div>

/eel_pubtest/string

<div
  class="publish"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="std_msgs.msg.String"
>
  <input type="text" ext=".data" value="{{value}}" style="display: none"/>
  <button class="btn">
    {{label}}
  </button>
</div>

/eel_pubtest/int32

<div
  class="publish"
  name="{{name}}"
  m-type="std_msgs.msg.Int32"
>
  <input type="number" ext=".data" value={{value}} style="display: none"/>
  <button class="btn">
    {{label}}
  </button>
</div>

ROS Params

/eel_paramtest/bool

<input class="rosparam" name="{{name}}" type="checkbox" />

/eel_paramtest/number

<input class="rosparam" name="{{name}}" type="number" value=-1 />

/eel_paramtest/string

<input class="rosparam" name="{{name}}" type="text" value="" />

/eel_paramtest/enum Radio

{% set element_id = generate_id() %}
<div id="{{element_id}}">
  {% for item in map %}
    <input
      class="rosparam"
      type="radio"
      name="{{name}}"
      value="{{item['value']}}"
      id="{{element_id}}-{{item['value']}}"
    />
    <label
      for="{{element_id}}-{{item['value']}}"
    >{{item['label']}}</label>
  {% endfor %}
</div>

/eel_paramtest/enum Select

{% set element_id = generate_id() %}
<select
  class="rosparam"
  name="{{name}}"
  id="{{element_id}}"
  value=""
>
  {% for item in map %}
  <option value="{{item['value']}}">{{item['label']}}</option>
  {% endfor %}
</select>

/eel_paramtest/object Object

<div class="rosparam" name="{{name}}">
  <input type="number" data-key="[0]" />
  <input type="number" data-key="[1]" />
  <input type="number" data-key="[2]" />
  <input type="number" data-key="[3]" />
</div>

Tabs
  • Tab 1
  • Tab 2
  • Tab 3

Hover Description

固定二値化

適応二値化

大津の二値化

<!--
detailにdata-row-idを含む特定のイベントをリッスンし、
CSVデータからdata-row-idに一致する行を取得し、
テキスト表示するコンポーネント
-->
<div class="description" data-event-name="UIDescription">
  <h4 class="description-field" data-column-name="title"></h4>
  <h4 class="description-field" data-column-name="category"></h4>
  <p class="description-field" data-column-name="id"></p>
  <p class="description-field" data-column-name="description"></p>
</div>
